note.p: Death: New Haven, Connecticut, USA (07 October 1939)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1939-1941 vol 3 pp 277-290, plate, by W B Cannon
References: Claude Debru, 'On the Usefulness of the History of Science for Scientific Education' in NR 1997 vol 51 pp 291-307
Alexander G Bearn, 'Fading icon', review of Michael Bliss, 'William Osler: a life in medicine' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 268-271
